articles.description: An unfortunate yet inevitable side-effect of the popularity of gadgets is e-waste, and it's something that every company has to address. But Apple is facing a literal skyscraper.
articles.content:
During Apple's financials earnings call the other day, CEO Tim Cook casually announced that Apple's hardware ecosystem had exceeded 1.65 billion devices by the end of last year.
At the time I rememb… [+2462 chars]
